title: No Fee! Allston 1Bd, Laundry, Heat & HW, Cat Ok, Call Now! Avail 8-8!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 32252358', 'Rent: $1,950 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/08/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', "-No broker's fee, landlord paying full rental fee to respective rental agent!!(Save $1,950 right off the bat!!)", '-Large 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located on Kelton Street in Allston', '-Hardwood', 'Flooring in living room, hallway and bedroom', '-Tiled Kitchen comes with oven/stove, full refrigerator and plenty of cabinet space.', '-2 bay windows allow for an abundance of natural lighting in apartment.', '-Cat', 'Ok', '-Student', 'Ok', '-Heat and Hot Water included in rent!!', '-Laundry available in basement of building', '-Convenient street parking available for people with resident stickers.', "-One of the last apartments on the market for an august move in so don't wait, call today!!!", '-Apartment comes available 8-8 for a 12 month lease only.', 'FEATURES', 'Cat Friendly', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Laundry in Building', 'Lots of Light', 'Near Green Line', 'Connor J. Hanrahan', 'Prestige Rental Solutions', 'FOR MORE EXCLUSIVE LISTINGS VISIT: <URL>', 'Anti discrimination Policy-', 'All apartments advertised by Prestige Rental Solutions are available on an equal opportunity basis.', 'All real estate advertised herein is subject to the federal Fair Housing Act and the Massachusetts state law, M.G.L. c.151B, which makes it illegal to advertise any preference, limitation, or discrimination , or discriminate against any person because of race, color, religion, sex, disability ,family status, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, genetic information , ancestry, martial status, national origin or because the person is a member of the  armed forces.']
